blogPost.excerpt: Find penpals from around the world. Exchange languages, culture and tradition. Have meaningful discussions and build long-lasting friendships.
blogPost.body: Find penpals from around the world. Exchange languages, culture and tradition. Have meaningful discussions and build long-lasting friendships.
blogPost.title: GetAPenPal - Find PenPals From Around The World
blogPost.author: Maksim Goranov Jovovic

localize.description: 寻找来自世界各地的笔友。交流语言、文化和传统。进行有意义的讨论，建立持久的友谊。
localize.tagline: 查找来自世界各地的笔友

localize.description: 尋找來自世界各地的筆友。交流語言、文化和傳統。進行有意義的討論，建立持久的友誼。
localize.tagline: 查找來自世界各地的筆友

previous.excerpt: For too long, early stage startups have been a walled garden, so we decided to build a door. 🚪 (1) Over text message, tell us what you're looking for (2) We'll monitor for matching jobs (3) We'll connect you with the founding team when there's a match
previous.title: Pearl - An SMS hiring network for the startup world

localize.description: 太久以来，早期创业公司一直是一座有围墙的花园，所以我们决定建一扇门。🚪(1)通过短信告诉我们您在寻找什么(2)我们将监控是否有匹配的工作(3)当有匹配的工作时，我们会为您接通创始团队
localize.tagline: 面向初创企业的短信招聘网络

localize.description: 太久以來，早期創業公司一直是一座有圍牆的花園，所以我們決定建一扇門。🚪(1)通過短信告訴我們您在尋找什麼(2)我們將監控是否有匹配的工作(3)當有匹配的工作時，我們會爲您接通創始團隊
localize.tagline: 面向初創企業的短信招聘網絡

next.excerpt: Metrics generates infographics about you so you can embed them on your GitHub profile to let other users know more about you. Display your git stats along with an isometric calendar, favorites music, website performances, last tweets, projects, languages,..
next.title: GitHub Metrics - Customize your profile with various plugins and metrics

localize.description: Metrics会生成关于您的信息图表，这样您就可以将它们嵌入到您的GitHub个人资料中，让其他用户更多地了解您。显示您的git统计数据，以及等距日历、收藏音乐、网站性能、最近的推文、项目、语言等。
localize.tagline: 使用各种插件和指标自定义您的配置文件

localize.description: Metrics會生成關於您的信息圖表，這樣您就可以將它們嵌入到您的GitHub個人資料中，讓其他用戶更多地瞭解您。顯示您的git統計數據，以及等距日曆、收藏音樂、網站性能、最近的推文、項目、語言等。
localize.tagline: 使用各種插件和指標自定義您的配置文件
